column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/89ec3a29111075ff1eb8309d6a43662c492c30af for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
ACK, it makes sense to base the choice on the network ID directly.\nThis also means that future added chains will be shown as testnet, which is much more likely than a new mainnet.\n
